column5: Well I only have about 8 hours before the limo picks us up and heads for the airport, then off to Florida for 7 days. We are doing the traditional Disney, Bush Gardens and if all goes as planned we will get out to do a little fishing at least one day. Have a great week every body.
Taper stay aay from mid-Florida if at all possible.... they just experianced a tornado and sustained alot of damage...  Have a great week!!! and take lots of pictures!!!   Gerritt.

have a nice trip..and stay out of trouble..enjoy the holiday with your wife & kids...like gerritt said they just had 12 tornadoes around the orlando area its a huge mess,i think they declared it a disaster zone...cheers..go get a tan man
Hope you have a blast on your trip!  Look forward to your fishing report too!  Be safe!
Thanks guys, the Tornado's were just norht of the Orlando area. Just my luck we are staying in Orlando for the first three days. then over to Tampa.
